Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You attempt to disarm your foe with a well-aimed shot. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Aim] and then make a ranged Strike against your mark. If the Strike hits, attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Disarm] the target using the same ranged attack roll against the target's Reflex DC, instead of attempting an Athletics check. A Disarming Shot counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've used Disarming Shot.
